name: loveyouforms
description: Cloud app to handle form submissions for one website or 1,000 using Firebase platform

## Scripts Notes #######################.database:import: you will need to run this once to import the starter database
## Scripts Notes #######################.database:export: you may never need this. exports production database and saves to local file 'exported.json'
## Scripts Notes #######################.fbdev: starts firebase local development emulators including database from functions/dev/database/

scripts.fbjest: npm run env:dev && npm run require:dev && firebase emulators:start --only firestore,functions  --import="./dev/database"
scripts.deploy: npm run env:unset && npm run require:default && firebase deploy --only functions

## devDependencies Notes ###############.firestore-export-import: required once to import starter database
## devDependencies Notes ###############.fs: needed for script exportData, and dev/replace-string.js
